recipes.label: Improve my Knowledge of the invisible arts?
recipes.startdescription: If I have two lore fragments of the same level and aspect, I can study them together to improve my understanding. If I use Reason, I can analyse the lore, breaking it down into lower-level fragments. Or I can use another type of lore to subvert it...

recipes.label: A Bold Experiment
recipes.startdescription: I need only purchase a few final ingredients, and then I can prepare the mixture. I must summon my courage... and find a suitable meal.

recipes.label: The Feast of the Honeyed Dove
recipes.startdescription: I can consume Remnants, to preserve a little of their knowledge from dust. I may yet have to.

recipes.label: Exercise the Body: Secret Techniques?
recipes.startdescription: Nothing in this lore will be of use here. I must choose something else.

recipes.label: Increase my Health?
recipes.startdescription: The more Health I gain, the more Vitality I'll need. [Use Skill: Physique to increase Health further.]

recipes.label: Increase my Reason?
recipes.startdescription: The more Reason I gain, the more Erudition I'll need. [Use Skill: Scholarship to increase Reason further.]

recipes.label: Increase my Passion?
recipes.startdescription: The more Passion I gain, the more Glimmering I'll need. [Use Skill: Imagination to increase Passion further.]

recipes.label: Maintaining a Marvel
recipes.startdescription: Even the greatest allure, over time, will flicker and grey. I must stoke it with the colours of obsession.

recipes.label: Upgrade Influences?
recipes.startdescription: It might be possible, with the right combination of Influences, to raise more power... but only if I have the necessary knowledge of the invisible arts.
